attributes.action: standardise treatments of post - surgery anaemia and malnutrition by offering STRICTER advice to Trusts on discharge planned medications. Please consider a cost - benefit analysis into a "presumptive symptom" policy and routinely give vitamins.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please ensure patients are not discharged without a full blood count. The petitioner is calling on NICE to examine how feasible it would be to give routine calcium to orthopaedic patients and iron to all post - surgical patients.
